```{r}
library(VennDiagram)
library(gplots)
# library(limma)
# library(venneuler)
```

```{r}
library(RColorBrewer)
venn.plot = venn.diagram(list(B = 1:1800, 
                  A = 1571:2020,
                  C = 500:1100),
             fill = c(brewer.pal(7, "Set1")[1:3]),
             alpha = c(0.5, 0.5, 0.5),
             cex = 2,
             cat.cex = 3,
             cat.fontface = 4,
             lty = 2,
             fontfamily = 3,
             resolution = 300,
             filename = "trial2.tiff"
             );
```
